I could not reproduce it.
However I changed the code to only put strings into the rootPaths instance
variables.
Please reopen if you get it again.
Fixed and released in HEAD.

Just another guess: Might have been a concurrency issue that
computeAllRootPaths(..) has been called twice.
Verified for 3.1 RC1 with build I20050527-0010.
